Title: Golden Hour rule: How gaps in Nigeria’s emergency response compound fatalities
Summary: Mrs Charity Unachukwu gave up the ghost on 20th September 2025, at the University of Nsukka Teaching Hospital (UNTH), Enugu State .

Title: Lagos Assembly  confirms Sanwo-Olu’s nominee as STF BoT chair
Summary: Lagos State House of Assembly confirmed Enitan Oshodi as Chairman of the State Trust Fund (STF) Board of Trustees (BoT) Mr Oshodi was nominated by Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu .

Title: Communities express worry over new cement plant plan in Ebonyi
Summary: Communities express worry over new cement plant plan in Ebonyi . Communities hosting the moribund Nigerian Cement Company (Nigercem) are expressing concerns .

Title: Jigawa domesticates tax reform  as momentum builds in North
Summary: Jigawa, Plateau, Kogi, Nasarawa and Kwara states are taking steps to domesticate the reforms . The move comes as Nigeria commences the implementation of its new tax laws .

Title: Super Eagles arrive Marrakesh, bank  on FG’s payment of AFCON allowances
Summary: The Minister of State for Finance, Dr Doris Nkiruka Uzoka-Anite, cleared the air on the delay in payment of allowances for players and officials of the Super Eagles at the ongoing 35th Africa Cup of Nation in Morocco .

Title: How policies, prices, floods shaped agriculture in 2025
Summary: Federal Government announced a temporary six-month ban on the export of raw shea nuts to encourage local processing and value addition . The ban was announced by the Federal Government .

Title: Dangote Refinery sells direct to marketers, as deal with depot owners crashes
Summary: Dangote Refinery sells direct to marketers, as deal with depot owners crashes . "They agreed on N806 coastal rate and N828 gantry price. After the first month, international crude oil benchmark dropped, and the private depot owners requested a reduction"

Title: He’s like a jilted lover — Momodu knocks Baba-Ahmed over ‘disgruntled politicians’ comment
Summary: Momodu said he was taken aback by the tone of Baba-Ahmed’s comments . He warned that politics should not be shaped by personal grievance or emotional reactions .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, January 9, 2026
Summary: The Nigerian Naira opened the second week of January 2026 with continued fluctuations across the various trading windows . Market participants monitor the latest liquidity injections from the Central Bank of Nigeria .

Title: BVN enrolments rise 6% to 67.8m in 2025 — NIBSS
Summary: Bank Verification Number (BVN) enrolments rose by 6.8 per cent year-on-year to 67.8 million as at December 2025 . NIBSS attributed the growth to stronger policy enforcement by the Central Bank .
